Sentencas: In this study, a single unit of planar micro-solid-oxide fuel cell (RSOFC) is investigated numerically to evaluate the influences of flow channel design, oxygen composition, and thermal operating conditions on cell performance.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Four flow channel designs are examined under the co-flow configuration: serpentine, double serpentine, rod bundle, and oblique rib.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For all designs, the contacts areas of interconnect to electrodes are kept consistent to maintain the ohmic losses at the same level.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To characterize the mass transport effects, there are three different compositions, 100% O-2, 50% O-2/50% N-2 and air, fed to the cathode inlet.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Different thermal conditions, adiabatic and isothermal, are applied to the outer boundary of the mu SOFC and the results are compared.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The outcomes suggest that both thermal conditions and oxidant composition show remarkable influences on mu SOFC performance.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Under adiabatic conditions, the rise of cell temperature causes a decrease in reversible voltage, deteriorating the overall cell competence.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: When oxygen is diluted with nitrogen, local gas diffusion becomes dominant to the cathode reaction.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Bulk flow, on the other hand, plays a minor role in cell performance since there is little deviation in the polarization curves for all flow channel designs, even at high current densities.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: For comparison, the flow visualization technique is employed to observe the transport phenomena in various flow channel designs.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The flow patterns are found to resemble the concentration distribution, providing a useful tool to design mu SOFCs.
Titulo: Numerical characterization of a microscale solid-oxide fuel cell
